Description: The BookRetreats API allows authorised partners direct and easy access to listings from over 500 retreats in over 100 locations worldwide. Database of retreats available as XML or JSON. Developers can use our API to display Bookretreats listings on their website as well as in confirmation emails for bookings conducted for other services. BookRetreats.com helps customers discover and book the best yoga retreats, wellness retreats, and yoga teacher trainings on the planet. It allows visitors to unplug from daily life, de-stress, and recharge their batteries.
